short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and auto-apply custom speeds for different YouTube channels. Customize preset speeds via the controller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Channel-Based Speed Settings
路 Save and auto-apply custom playback speeds for individual YouTube channels
路 Seamlessly switches speeds when changing between channels. Perfect for YouTubers with different speaking styles and speed

 Flexible Speed Controls
路 Customizable quick-switch speed presets
路 Adjustable speed step value for fine-tuning
路 Configurable controller position on video player
路 Optional global speed memory
